content.webTitle: BBC Sports Personality of the Year shortlist

fields.headline: BBC reveals Sports Personality of the Year shortlist
fields.bodyText: Ten British sportsmen and women, from seven different sports, make up the shortlist for this year's BBC Sports Personality of the Year 2008. The shortlist (in alphabetical order) is: Rebecca Adlington Ben Ainslie Joe Calzaghe Nicole Cooke Lewis Hamilton Chris Hoy Andy Murray Christine Ohuruogu Rebecca Romero Bradley Wiggins The event will be held at Liverpool's Echo Arena on Sunday December 14, with a sell-out audience of 9,000 people expected, when the sports personalities will compete for the public's vote. The shortlist of contenders was put together by a panel of 28 sports editors from national and regional newspapers and magazines. In addition to the main award of Sports Personality of the Year there will also be awards for: Team of the Year Coach of the Year Overseas Sports Personality of the Year Lifetime Achievement Helen Rollason Award Young Sports Personality of the Year Sports Unsung Hero
